title: kagent
description: Complete documentation for kagent - the AI agent platform for Kubernetes.

items.title: Introduction
items.description: Welcome to kagent! Start here to understand what kagent is, how to install it, and how to contribute.

items.title: Installing kagent
items.description: Learn how to install kagent

items.title: What is kagent
items.description: Understand what kagent is and its core purpose.

items.title: Getting Started
items.description: Guides to help you get started with kagent, from quick setup to your first agent and tool.

items.title: Quick Start
items.description: A quick guide to get kagent installed and running with your first AI agent.

items.title: Your First Agent
items.description: Learn how to create your first AI agent using the kagent dashboard.

items.title: Your First MCP tool
items.description: Learn how to add an MCP (Model Context Protocol) tool to your kagent agent.

items.title: Local Development
items.description: Build, test and run agents locally.

items.title: Writing System Prompts
items.description: Learn the art and science of writing effective system prompts for your kagent agents.

items.title: Tracing
items.description: A guide to tracing your kagent agents.

items.title: Core Concepts
items.description: Understand the fundamental concepts and architecture of kagent.

items.title: Architecture
items.description: Explore the high-level architecture of kagent, including its core components like the Controller, App/Engine, CLI, and Dashboard.

items.title: Agents
items.description: Dive into the concept of AI agents in kagent, their components (instructions, tools, skills), and how they can even use other agents as tools.

items.title: Tools
items.description: Understand the different types of tools kagent can use, including built-in, MCP, and HTTP tools, and how tool discovery works.

items.title: Supported Providers
items.description: Learn how to configure various LLM providers like OpenAI, Azure OpenAI, Anthropic, and Ollama for kagent.

items.title: Amazon Bedrock
items.description: Use Amazon Bedrock models with kagent via the OpenAI Chat Completions API.

items.title: Anthropic
items.description: Learn how to configure Anthropic models for kagent.

items.title: Azure OpenAI
items.description: Learn how to configure Azure OpenAI models in kagent.

items.title: Gemini
items.description: Learn how to configure Gemini models in kagent.

items.title: Google Vertex AI
items.description: Learn how to configure Google Vertex AI models in kagent.

items.title: Ollama
items.description: Learn how to configure Ollama models in kagent.

items.title: OpenAI
items.description: Learn how to configure OpenAI models in kagent.

items.title: BYO OpenAI-compatible model
items.description: Bring your own OpenAI-compatible model to kagent.

items.title: Examples
items.description: Explore practical examples and use cases for kagent.

items.title: A2A Agents
items.description: Discover how to implement Agent-to-Agent (A2A) communication and collaboration with kagent.

items.title: BYO ADK Agents
items.description: Bring your own ADK agent to kagent

items.title: BYO CrewAI Agents
items.description: Bring your own CrewAI agent to kagent

items.title: BYO LangGraph Agents
items.description: Bring your own LangGraph agent to kagent

items.title: Documentation Agent
items.description: See an example of a kagent agent built to help with documentation-related tasks.

items.title: Slack and A2A
items.description: Learn how to create a Slack bot that interacts with kagent via A2A

items.title: Discord and A2A
items.description: Learn how to create a Discord bot that interacts with kagent via A2A

items.title: Skills
items.description: Learn how to add skills to your agents to guide their behavior and tool usage.

items.title: Operations
items.description: Manage your kagent installation with upgrade, uninstall, and operational tasks.

items.title: Debug kagent
items.description: Find solutions to common issues and troubleshooting tips for kagent.

items.title: Operational considerations
items.description: Important operational considerations when running kagent in production.

items.title: Upgrade kagent
items.description: Learn how to upgrade kagent to the latest version.

items.description: Learn how to uninstall kagent from your Kubernetes cluster.

items.description: Find helpful resources and FAQs for kagent. Access guides, community links, and more.
